title: ILION Constructed
summary: CORELAI SECTOR completes construction of ILION, its first capital-class interstellar vessel.

title: ILION Enters Earth Orbit
summary: The flagship ILION begins orbital operations around Terra in preparation for authorization procedures.

title: Colonization Mission Authorized
summary: UEG grants CORELAI SECTOR permission to launch its first interstellar expansion mission toward TE-110D (SORAN).
body:
On 2125-03-09, following a comprehensive evaluation of submitted protocols, logistical capacity, and strategic-ethical alignment, the United Earth Governance (UEG) formally granted CORELAI SECTOR the status of "Interstellar Multi-Domain Operator – Level 1".

This authorization enabled CORELAI to initiate its first autonomous deployment beyond Earth's orbit, with operational mandates including exploration, terraformation, and settlement.

The designated destination is the TE-110 system, with primary focus on planetary body TE-110D, officially designated as "SORAN".

The launch window was officially opened, and authorization was recorded at the UEG Orbital Node, Geneva.

title: EMBER Constructed
summary: The EMBER battle cruiser is commissioned as an advanced tactical asset for SECTOR operations.

title: EMBER Joins ILION Fleet
summary: EMBER enters formation with ILION, officially becoming part of CORELAI SECTOR’s expeditionary fleet.

title: Arrival at SORAN Orbit
summary: CORELAI SECTOR fleet reaches orbit of TE-110D (SORAN), initiating Phase 1 of interstellar colonization.
body:
On 2125-04-02, the CORELAI SECTOR colonization fleet successfully completed its interstellar transit and entered orbital position above planetary body TE-110D, designated "SORAN".

This milestone marks the activation of Phase 1 of Operation Expansion Prime, initiating planetary surface deployment and infrastructural establishment.

Automated descent units were dispatched to predefined zones, commencing terrain mapping, atmospheric analysis, and activation of primary infrastructure nodes.

Landing confirmation was received by the United Earth Governance at 22:45 UTC, marking the official beginning of permanent human-aligned presence on SORAN.

The event is classified as humanity's first sanctioned interstellar settlement beyond Earth orbit.
